review: Dr Mehak is a hands on doctor always ready to guide the patients very patiently . Children are most difficult to handle for dental treatment but she is able to handle the kids with care and love . Very flexible as per patient’s needs for time also .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I took my 5 year old daughter to Dr. Mehak as she had a cavity and black deposits in a tooth. Dr. Mehak was very friendly and gave around an hour to explain my daughter about all her medical equipments to make her comfortable and that there will be no pain during the procedure. 
She even recited few rhymes to my daughter.

My daughter had visited a different dentist earlier but was so terrified after seeing all medical equipment’s that she started crying and the procedure could not be completed. 
Then later, I came to know about Dr. Mehak through a friend.

I would recommend Dr. Mehek to everyone having kids who don't like visiting doctors specially a dentist. 

I will give her 10 / 10.

Thanks a lot.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My 5 year old son, had been complaining of pain in a premolar. Our visit to Dr Mehak revealed that his tooth was decaying and needed extraction. The procedure was carried out by Dr. Mehak like a great professional but what amazed me more was the amount of patience and concern she has for our children. She gave him all possible chances to throw his tantrums and get over his fear...she did not rush into the surgery, instead even defered the surgery once so that the child does not get phobic of the scene. 
I think she never gives up on her patients of such young age, though chilldren can exhibit horrendous drama in dental clinics. And this us because she is a very good prrson , a young mother hherself and undoubtedly an exemplary professional. 
Post surgery recovery of my child has been exactly as she had explained...my child is happy and healthy.
Highly appreciate the work of Dr. Mehak and her team.
100%Recommended for children of all age.
reply_text: Thanks ma'am for this amazing feedback.

review:
I am so glad to have found Dr Mehak.
She is so warm and explains the procedure very well and does not rush into anything. She is patient to repeat if you do not understand and allows you take time in the process. My son is super happy and is always relaxed when visiting her for regular check ups. 
Thank you doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was looking for a friendly pediatric dentist for   my 2.5 yrs old boy and many of my friends recommended Dr. Mehak Nagpal. they specifically mentioned that she's very patient and  friendly   the clinic is also very child friendly( little play area with toys and books).I looked no further and no wonder she was too good at managing my little one and he easily got the cavities drilled and filled.Highly highly recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I started visiting Dr. Mehak last year in April for my son's tooth trauma. Since then I have been regular with her . Gentle, compassionate,  friendly, understanding...all these adjectives are synonms to her. I would highly recommend her for kids as well as for adults.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr Mehak for my daughter's toothache problem. She is very friendly with kids and makes them very comfortable. My daughter runs away from doctors but even after RCT she was ready to visit the clinic next time. That's a quality a parent would want in a doctor for his child so that child is not scared of the doctor. RCT and fillings are done in excellently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Treating a toddler with tooth problems is challenging and like any parent I wanted it to be a less painful experience for my child.Dr. Mehak was very patient and welcoming to my kid.She did not rush us into getting it treated but instead made my child comfortable and treated him for his dental carries. I would definitely recommend Dr Mehak for a satisfying experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Mahek is so caring towards her patients and she explains things clearly.
Her behaviour, friendliness, ability to gel with children, patience make her stand tall and help her gain trust of her patient.
My daughter loves to be with her just because of her friendly and caring attitude, even though she has gone through some painful procedures in her chamber including dental extraction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I really like the way Dr Mehak handles the young kids. My 7 year old who was scared of dental treatment has now become very friendly with doctor and get his treatment done smoothly. thanks a lot Dr Mehak.Recently we have got the treatment done through 'Laughing Gas Machine' for my son's extraction and it was done without any pain. Amazing experience for kids and parents.
